long_description: Channel your inner flower power and pedal along casually on the Electra Daisy 3i women's cruiser bike, which offers laid-back comfort, 3 gears and great style. Flat Foot Technology(TM) geometry offers a relaxed, efficient pedaling position that also allows you to easily and comfortably put both feet down on the ground when stopped. Aluminum frame is resilient and is adorned with a floral motif; step-through design makes mounting and dismounting the bike quick and easy. Shimano Nexus 3-speed internally geared rear hub with coaster brake offers silky-smooth shifting and low-maintenance stopping power. Easy-shifting twist shifter and comfortable ergonomic hand grips add cruising convenience and comfort. Have fun while staying clean and looking good with the painted-to-match chain cover and front and rear fenders; saddle and grips complement the floral graphics. Platform pedals are compatible with most types of footwear-just hop on and go! Keep other cyclists and pedestrians apprised of your presence with the handlebar-mounted bell. One size fits most. Specs on the Electra Daisy 3i women's cruiser bike are subject to change.
short_description: Channel your inner flower power and pedal along casually on the Electra Daisy 3i women's cruiser bike, which offers laid-back comfort, 3 gears and great style.
